member.summary: Guesses the extension of a file based on its contents.

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.ReverseBits(System.Byte)
member.summary: Reverses the order of bits in a byte, probably very inefficiently.

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.Backup(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Makes a backup of a file if not already found, and returns the backed-up path.

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.GetRealExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the extension of the specified file path, removing .dcx if present.

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.GetRealFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file name of the specified path, removing both .dcx if present and the actual extension.

member.summary: Decompresses data and returns a new BinaryReaderEx if necessary.

member.summary: FromSoft's basic filename hashing algorithm, used in some BND and BXF formats.

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.IsPrime(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Determines whether a number is prime or not.

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.DateToBinderTimestamp(System.DateTime)

member.name: M:SoulsFormats.SFUtil.Adler32(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Computes an Adler32 checksum used by Zlib.

member.summary: Concatenates multiple collections into one list.

member.summary: Convert a list to a dictionary with indices as keys.

member.summary: Converts a hex string in format "AA BB CC DD" to a byte array.
